body_html:
I don't know about other members but as for myself I would love to see new synchronisation mechanism beyond the common ones we have right now (parameter server, distributed replicated using all-reduce, etc.).

Looking forward to your patch.

body:
I don't know about other members but as for myself I would love to see new synchronisation mechanism beyond the common ones we have right now (parameter server, distributed replicated using all-reduce, etc.). 

Looking forward to your patch.
